mapper.insert: insert into forums(user_id, title, content, create_time, update_time) values (#{userId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
insert into forum_likes(forum_id, user_id, create_time) values (#{forumId}, #{userId}, #{createTime})
mapper.delete: delete from forum_likes where forum_id = #{forumId} and user_id = #{userId}
